name: spotify_bulk_search
description: Search for multiple queries on Spotify in parallel using concurrent browser tabs. More efficient than calling spotify_search multiple times. Pass all search queries as a single comma-separated string.

parameters.name: queries
parameters.description: Comma-separated search queries (e.g. 'Bohemian Rhapsody, Stairway to Heaven, Hotel California')

detailSteps.code: const tracks = []; const trackRows = document.querySelectorAll('[data-testid="tracklist-row"], [data-testid="search-tracks-result"] [data-testid="tracklist-row"]'); for (let i = 0; i < Math.min(trackRows.length, 5); i++) { const row = trackRows[i]; const nameEl = row.querySelector('[data-testid="internal-track-link"], .encore-text a, a[href^="/track"]'); const artistEl = row.querySelector('a[href^="/artist"]'); tracks.push({ name: nameEl ? nameEl.textContent.trim() : '', artist: artistEl ? artistEl.textContent.trim() : '', link: nameEl ? nameEl.href || '' : '' }); } const artists = []; const artistLinks = document.querySelectorAll('section a[href^="/artist"]'); const seen = new Set(); for (let i = 0; i < Math.min(artistLinks.length, 3); i++) { const a = artistLinks[i]; const name = a.textContent.trim(); if (name && !seen.has(name)) { seen.add(name); artists.push({ name: name, link: a.href || '' }); } } return { query: new URL(window.location.href).pathname.replace('/search/', '').replace(/%20/g, ' '), track_count: tracks.length, tracks: tracks, artist_count: artists.length, artists: artists }
detailSteps.name: search_result
detailSteps.label: Extract search results
